message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.LG. 

The paper focuses on designing a secure and high throughput blockchain system via sharding, which falls under the categories of cryptography (cs.CR), distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), databases (cs.DB), and machine learning (cs.LG) as reputation-based mechanisms are utilized. However, since the paper primarily deals with the security and performance aspects of the blockchain system, cs.CR and cs.DC are the most likely categories.
